title: The Thief of Baghdad
creator_credit: Raoul Walsh, Douglas Fairbanks and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: Douglas Fairbanks plays the part of the Thief of Bagdad. He tries to win the heart of his true love, the Caliph’s daughter, by competing with various Princes to find rare treasure.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

creator_credit_for_label: Raoul Walsh, Douglas Fairbanks and United Artists Corporation
description: Douglas Fairbanks plays the part of the Thief of Bagdad. He tries to win the heart of his true love, the Caliph’s daughter, by competing with various Princes to find rare treasure. He climbs clouds, battles sea-creatures and killer plants, defeats the Mongols with an army of dust, rides a winged horse and finally becomes victorious. This silent classic is a much loved children’s film.
description_for_label: Douglas Fairbanks plays the part of the Thief of Bagdad.
